About Us

Samarth Meditech is the brainchild of 2 young Engineering graduates. Under the mentorship of Mr Nayak, a Meditech industry veteran with 30 yrs experience and Mr. Purohit, a Solutions Architect, Samarth Meditech set out to develop new age applications for the Medical, Pharma and Healthcare industries.

We spent a considerable amount of time talking to and working with Industry Experts, Medicine Practitioners, Hospital Management, Chartered Accountants and the ‘on the floor’ staff isolating pain points and challenges.A host of unique features that will save time, efforts, retain customers and plug the leakages have been added to the Apps after.

The technology platforms chosen bring the advantages and flexibility of the next generation technologies into your everyday life making every product of Samarth Meditech highly efficient.

Samarth Meditech confers

seamless service

Medical/Healthcare business grow by controlling cost and maximizing profits at the same time by keeping the customers happy . For this Samarth Meditech provides seamless services

reduce service time

Samarth Meditech Applications helps you put processes in place no matter how small the business that can reduce service time and even give full patient/ customer history in a click

personalized service

Samarth Meditech make applications that are truly personalized like using messaging features for reminders, thank you messages and many more.

highly responsive solutions

Pain points and challenges are isolated by working with Industry Experts, Medicine Practitioners, hence Samarth Meditech applications come up with highly responsive solutions

Our Team

Sharangouda Agni

Founder/ CEO

Sharan is a Graduate in Electrical Engineering from VTU with more than 5 years of professional experience in organizations like Wipro. He is passionate about organizing and executing complex operations and is adept at managing businesses spread across the globe.

Narasimhadatta patil

Founder/ COO

Datta has more than 8 years of Meditech experience and has created multiple successful products for the industry. His vision is to help small and medium scale businesses to scale up, use newer technologies and improve their margins. He also brings in a vast network in the meditech industry.

Chandan Purohit

CTO

Chandan is the driving force for Samarth Meditech in terms of Technology selection and architecture. He has worked on making all our Applications user friendly and highly responsive. He holds a Masters in Computer Science. Teaching is his passion and has been a great contributor on GitHub.

Shirish Morab

CMO

Shirish has more than 15 years of global and domestic industry experience setting up and operating delivery teams. He is an expert in creating and executing ‘go to market’ strategies, creating partnerships and driving teams to achieve. He is avid reader and nature explorer over the weekends.

our advisories

Sudhesh Nayak

Founder - Akshay Infotech.

Mr Nayak is a meditech industry veteran with more than 25 years of experience .His rich functional expertise and inputs pertaining to accounting and financial operations in the pharma LOB have truly made our products what the industry needs. He is full time Functional Advisor to Samarth Meditech.

Anand Kulkarni

Consulting Advisor

Anand is an IIM-Indore and university of Pittsburgh USA alumnus.He has been associated with ITC,Maruti Suzuki and ICICI bank in various capacities.Samarth utilized his experience in sales and marketing to compete in the crucial market.

Manjunath Yalagi

CMO

Yalagi manjunath have 7+ years’ experience as manager in various MNC companies like amazon. He has managed complete inventory management and delivery cycles of the organization. He has experience in replenishment management, logistics. His experience has given various knowledge in building of Samarth meditech.

Subramanya Mujumdar

CMO

Subramanya Mujumdar has 15+ years of experience in design and development of could scale applications. He has designed and developed the platform layer for Oracle's Billing and Revenue Management product. He has worked for Zuora's SaaS based billing and rating system. Currently working for Oracle America Inc.

Our Product Portfolio

SM KALPA

Retail Pharmacy Management System

The Smart way to boost productivity, improve efficiency and retain customers with host of new features to simplify the business operations and tracking

SM TEJAS

All integrated Hospital Management System

With advanced technological approch we Automate your Healthcare Facility to go paperless, improve efficiency & accelerate revenue

SM SHODHA

Pharma Distribution Administration Systems

Our advanced accounting features and analytics lets you focus on building your distribution network while Shodha does the rest for you.

SM DAKSHA

Clinic Administration Management Systems

Reduce clinical risk with Digital Documentation and efficient technical approch, Comply with standards and improve patient experience.

Samarth Meditech-Partnership

“Alone we can do little, together we can do so much” – Helen Keller
Our commitment to provide local support and service made us build some of the best partnerships that made all the difference. Our success till date can be attributed to our partners who have been Samarth Meditech’s greatest strength. Every partner goes through a rigorous screening and vetting process. Every partner then goes through full training sessions which make them understand Samarth’s vision and can connect with our goals and aims. This makes every Samarth Meditech Partner think and act like the core team with full accountability and responsibility to represent Samarth Meditech.

What do they say?

Customer reviews gives us energy to work more and correct our mistakes, thankfully our all most all customers are very happy with Samarth products, and Samarth assures you to give much better than yesterday.

"Ours is a 60 bed hospital with more than 15 resident and visiting Doctors. SM Tejas is the only product in the market which can integrate all aspects of running a hospital. The Doctor's pages are really helpful. The Management gets all reports on daily basis. We can now control and manage every aspect. Thanks to Samarth Meditech and wish them good luck."

Dr | Venkatesh AL

Senior Doctor @Heidelberg org.

"I am really happy with Samarth Meditech Kalpa. All our 4 pharmacies are now connected and SM Kalpa has made our life easy managing which was difficult before. All our Employees are also very happy as the App is so easy to use and maintain. We now save a lot of time and money."

Mr. Satish Kulkarni

Manikya medicals Belagavi.
